user_query: I'm a travel blogger and I'm looking for unique destinations to feature on my blog. Can you suggest some off-the-beaten-path locations in Europe that are not commonly visited by tourists? Also, provide information about the best hotels and local experiences in those destinations.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of off-the-beaten-path locations in Europe that are not commonly visited by tourists.
For each unique location identified in subtasks 1, find information on the best hotels available.
Research and gather information on local experiences and activities available in each unique destination.
